thread.title: Gilles Guillaume
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Gilles Guillaume

author: Gilles Guillaume
title: Gilles Guillaume
text:
Good sellers, good packages, good after-sales when problem happen, many coupon , flash deals.
The shippement take,for me, always the big value that banggood says, and rarely item is " chineese quality" but stay a good value for money.
A GREAT EXPERIENCE FOR ME
Everyone must try with few cheap item to have it's own experience.
